fields.description:
The undocumented (TIDOC-2282) but for Android and iOS implemented (TC-5371) {{insertAt}} and {{replaceAt}} methods need to be implemented for Windows as well.

/CC [~yuchi] (who will use this for a Titanium renderer for ReactJS)
fields.summary: Windows Parity: Ti.UI.View.insertAt and replaceAt not working

comments.body:
Verified the implementation.

Closing.
